item.title: R to @sofi_nn: Fantastic cast. Only just started watching it so late to the party as per. Funny hearing so many familiar place names my parents mentioned as are/were from Notts.

item.title: RT by @kirsteenmcnish: Having been to a lot of schools recently, I get the impression that the disruption of the pandemic has changed children in ways - some cheering some worrying - that we are not talking about. If you're a teacher and you have thoughts on this, I'd be really interested to hear.
item.dc:creator: @frankcottrell_b
item.description: Having been to a lot of schools recently, I get the impression that the disruption of the pandemic has changed children in ways - some cheering some worrying - that we are not talking about. If you're a teacher and you have thoughts on this, I'd be really interested to hear.
